subject: Help with Mild to Moderate UC (Ulcerative Colitis)
body:
Help gain 

control of your condition
 
					with more information

Did you know that approximately 500,000 Americans are currently 

diagnosed with ulcerative colitis? 
					Living with this condition can, without a doubt, be physically and 

emotionally 

taxing. The recurring 
					abdominal pain, diarrhea and rectal bleeding are certainly challenging. 

By 
					becoming more 

informed you 
					can take steps to help gain more control of your condition. Also, 

knowing more about 

ulcerative colitis 
					may help make conversations with your doctor easier. A good place to 

start is 
					the relationship between your emotions and your condition.

Learn more at 
					Managing 

UC

Managing UC was created to help you get the facts that you need to 

partner with 

your doctor and/or healthcare teams. 
					When you visit Managing UC, you will receive information about:
					
The relationship between stress and the condition
					What you can do to help you stay in control
					Where to go to get more help
					
If you are living with ulcerative colitis, go to Managing UC today 

to start taking 

an active role in gaining control of 
					your condition. Visit 

This Site for information at 
					Managing 

UC.
